cards.name: Dervish and Banges
cards.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or an opponent's).
cards.flavorText: 'Dervish and Banges, the wizarding equipment shop ...'
effect: Once during each player's turn, when they discard 1 of their Items from play, they may choose a non-Healing Item in their discard pile with printed Power cost less than the discarded Item and put it into their hand.

cards.name: Hogsmeade Station
cards.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or an opponent's).
effect: When either player uses an Action to play a card with a printed Power cost, their cards require 2 less Power to play until the end of their turn. (They must have at least 1 Power that matches.)

cards.name: Honeydukes
cards.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or an opponent's).
cards.flavorText: ''We'll bring you lots of sweets back from Honeydukes,' said Hermione, looking desperately sorry for him.'
effect: Whenever a player uses an Action to play a Candy card from their hand, they may play another Candy card from their discard pile without using an Action.

cards.name: Madam Rosmerta
cards.flavorText: 'A curvy sort of woman with a pretty face was serving a bunch of rowdy warlocks up at the bar.'
effect: The first time you would draw any number of cards each turn, you may instead put that many non-Healing cards from your discard pile on the bottom of your deck in any order.

cards.name: Comet Two Ninety
effect: When this card is discarded from play, draw 3 cards. (When you play this card, discard the other Broom(s) you control.)

cards.name: Dissendium
cards.note: Play this card only if a non-Hogsmeade Location is in play.
cards.flavorText: ''See you in Honeydukes,' said George, winking.'
effect: Search your deck. You may take a Hogsmeade Location from your deck and put it into play. Then shuffle your deck.

cards.name: On the Hogwarts Express
cards.flavorText: ' ... they were boarding the Hogwarts Express; talking and laughing as the countryside became greener and tidier ...'
effect: When you play this card, choose a card type. Once per turn, whenever you use an Action to play the second card of the chosen type this turn, you get an extra Action this turn.

cards.name: The Shrieking Shack
cards.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or an opponent's).
cards.flavorText: 'Paper was peeling from the walls; there were stains all over the floor; every piece of furniture was broken as though somebody had smashed it.'
effect: Before each player's turn, they take 4 damage.

cards.name: The Three Broomsticks Inn
cards.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or an opponent's).
cards.flavorText: 'Shall we go for a butterbeer in the Three Broomsticks?' — Ron Weasley
effect: At the end of each player's turn, if they put any number of cards into their deck, they may prevent up to 4 damage done to them during their opponent's next turn.

cards.name: Acid Pops
cards.flavorText: 'Breathe fire for your friends!' — Pepper Imps
effect: Choose an opponent's Creature in play and do 2 damage to it. Then draw a card.

cards.name: Broken Item
effect: To play this card, choose one of your Items in play. This card requires less Power to play equal to the chosen Item's printed Power cost. When you play this card, discard the chosen Item from play. Then, draw a card.

cards.name: Butterbeer
cards.flavorText: 'Butterbeer! Yeah, I like that stuff!' — Harry Potter
effect: Choose up to 2 non-Healing cards in your discard pile and put them on the top of your deck in any order. Until the beginning of your next turn, you may not draw cards.

cards.name: Haunting Screams
cards.flavorText: 'The villagers heard the noise and the screaming and thought they were hearing particularly violent spirits.' — Professor Remus Lupin
effect: To play this card, discard 1 of your Care of Magical Creatures Lessons from play. Count the number of Creatures in your discard pile. Do half that much damage to your opponent, rounded up.

cards.name: Permission Form
cards.flavorText: 'Please give the enclosed permission form to your parent or guardian to sign.' — Professor McGonagall
effect: Reveal your hand, then put a Lesson from your hand into play. You get 1 more Action this turn.

cards.name: Toothflossing Stringmints
cards.flavorText: 'Mum and Dad would really love those Toothflossing Stringmints from Honeydukes!' — Hermione Granger
effect: Put up to 3 non-Healing cards from your discard pile on the bottom of your deck in any order. Then draw a card.

cards.name: Werewolf
cards.flavorText: ' ... the werewolf reared, snapping its long jaws ...'
effect: When you play this card, you may discard 1 of your Care of Magical Creatures Lessons from play. If you do, this card does 5 damage to an opponent.
